column5: Ok,I bought my new hunting blind and it is awesome.Lots of room.BUT, I MEAN BUT,why do they have to use velcro for everything? Why not magnets? This is a hunting blind,so that means, QUIET.When you go to pull down the mesh window,it aint QUIET.NEENEE. Every creature in the bush is running saying NEE NEE,you aint getting me today.  You would think a hunting company would know this eh.  Wee rant done.

I have a rainsuit that's like that...LOUD VELCRO!!!  Makes me think that if I wear it..It'll scare the fish away..  I was thinking some kind of HEAVY DUTY ...Ziploc sorta thing.. I think that that would work.  Randy
Do you think this changes your odds Brian.....
a little tip.if you seperate it rrrrrrrrreeeeeaaaaalllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy slowly, it wont make noise
Call the company and complain. Tell them about your magnet idea! Maybe they will throw you something free!
Probably like most products---the designer never hunted a day in his life and the offshore company that made it just copied a design from someone else.
Just another reason I took mine back Saturday morning
Spray PAM on the wool side. I wanna see how this plays out.
Brian, call Leonard Duffy. He'll fix you up.
WHO?
the guy who invented it I think
I hate that about my blind too and even some of my hunting clothes.

Brian they use velcro so the newfs can hunt too ...as well as keep their sneakers on ...no more going to school to learn the hoop loop scoop thing ...greatest invention since slice bread ya know..  the real wonder of the world is ...how do they they get them spots on the certs candies
Cuz the damm hut would be stuck to the side of your head....you asked for that one.
Dont stand to close to the edge my friend.
Don't worry Brian, the only thing velcro is good for is shoes.I haven't tied a lace in so long, i forget how its done
No ZZ Top fans?  Velcro Fly baby!   Hmm... Why is that my wife has changed all my pant zippers to Velcro?  Son of a Gun!! That's why I can never find her when needed!
OUCH!!!!!!! hope you wear briefs man.
Kind of like how they make duck and goose calls in neon colours with shiny silver bands?  The magnets in my jacket work great, don't know how velcro works?
Ding Ding Ding!!!Winner.You hit the nail on the head. Joe
